articles.title: Tourism in 2022 approaches pre-pandemic levels - Products Eurostat News - Eurostat - European Commission

articles.title: Lavrov compares West's approach to Russia with Hitler's 'Final Solution' - Reuters
articles.description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said on Wednesday that the United States had assembled a coalition of European countries to solve "the Russian question" in the same way that Adolf Hitler had sought a "final solution" to eradicate Europe's Jews.
